definition: limpid autumn waters (trad. description of girl's beautiful eyes)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: This is because the water content of fresh day lily have Colchicine can cause poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲鮮黃花菜中含水量有秋水仙鹼，會引起中毒。

sentences.english: Sometimes they can only see their chelloldren through the eyes of a protector.
sentences.chinese: 有時，他們只能看見自己的孩子通過秋水的掩護。

sentences.english: This article summarized the latest progress in grape tetraploid induced with colchicines.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了秋水仙素誘導葡萄四倍體研究的最新進展。

sentences.english: You know how many forms of colchicine there a re on the market ?
sentences.chinese: 你知道秋水仙素在市場上有多少種形式嗎？

sentences.english: Those plants that determined as haploids were doubled by 2%colchicine.
sentences.chinese: 經鑑定爲單倍體的植株，用2%秋水仙素進行加倍。

sentences.english: So I questioned by your Chaplain-like eyes, I could not answer.
sentences.chinese: 以至於你的眼睛秋水般地呻問我的時候，我沒有答。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the preparation process of colchicine drop pills.
sentences.chinese: 目的確定秋水仙鹼滴丸的成型工藝。

sentences.english: Close your eyes and you'll see more than that.
sentences.chinese: 合上秋水你會看到不僅如此。

sentences.english: The influence of colchicine hydrolysates on the separation effect of color spectra was observed.
sentences.chinese: 觀察秋水仙素水解物對色譜分離效果的影響。

sentences.english: The rhizomes are rich in the alkaloid colchicine.
sentences.chinese: 根狀莖富有生物鹼秋水仙素。

sentences.english: "Childe, are you awake?"Also autumn waters momentary discovered his to wake up.
sentences.chinese: “公子，你醒了？”秋水也第一時間發現了他的醒來。

sentences.english: Do you know how many forms of colchicine there are on the market?
sentences.chinese: 你知道秋水仙素在市場上有多少種形式嗎？

sentences.english: The adjuvant of colchicine in immunization was observed.
sentences.chinese: 本文觀察了秋水仙素的免疫佐劑作用。

sentences.english: Probably the best known of these is colchicine which interferes with mitosis .
sentences.chinese: 知道的最清楚的可能是秋水仙鹼，它影響有絲分裂。

sentences.english: See through Red Dust, for ages, but also what?
sentences.chinese: 看破紅塵，望穿秋水，又能怎樣？

sentences.english: Just one dose of the colchicine produced this remarkable effect.
sentences.chinese: 只是其中的秋水仙素的劑量產生這種顯着的效果。

definition: autumn ripples/(fig.) luminous eyes of a woman/amorous glance
bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
lit. boat made of lily magnolia wood/poetic term for boat
to regret leaving/reluctant to part/(onom.) young leaves stir gently in the wind
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
